name: Explosive Temper (nyarla)
description:
Top down shooter where you have rich arsenal of different spells to play around. Learn the mechanics, unlock spells, find new builds to get further.

Gamepad fully supported

Music:

Tri-Tachyon - https://soundcloud.com/tri-tachyon/albums

Sound

Michel Baradari - https://opengameart.org/content/4-projectile-launches

Little Robot Sound Factory — https://opengameart.org/users/little-robot-sound-factory
